effect.black-white: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned. This includes bad poison. If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
effect.black-2-white-2: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned. This includes bad poison. If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavor_text.black-white: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
